header.title: Service providers
header.subtext: Global service providers looking to support African supply chains

b2bblocks.title: Enhance your digital presence
b2bblocks.content: Maximise your online visibility by creating a digital profile and re-direct traffic to your website. Display your services on your E-bulletin board.

b2bblocks.title: Increase your geographical outreach
b2bblocks.content:
Expand your footprint in the growing African apparel market.

Strengthen international coverage with our database of worldwide buyers and sellers.

b2bblocks.title: Find new leads and create sales opportunities
b2bblocks.content: Advertise your services and promote your company on the Home Feed to create business leads. Save time by directly connecting with prospect clients.

supportblocks.title: Manual Matching/Advisory
supportblocks.content:
Speed up business collaborations by joining our network of preferred Service Providers whom we match with selected Buyers and Sellers.

Take advantage of support & training from our Sales and Marketing team to optimise your digital journey.

supportblocks.title: Country Representatives
supportblocks.content: Take advantage of our Country Representatives in Buying and Producing countries who link you to the right customers in the region.
